projectTitle: 网易会议 SDK 文档
description: 网易会议多平台（Android/iOS/Web/Windows/macOS/Linux/Electron/H5）SDK 开发文档，包含快速开始、会议管理、会议安全、界面定制等完整功能模块
rules: Documentation for each platform is located in the corresponding platform directory. Start with README.md in each platform folder
For beginners: First read the platform's 'Integration Overview' (集成概述.md), then check the 'Quick Start' (快速开始) directory
Find module documentation based on your needs: Meeting Management, Meeting Security, UI Customization, etc.
Platform features and APIs may vary slightly. Please refer to the specific platform's documentation
All code examples in the documentation follow the best practices for the respective platform

previousVersions.description: 网易会议 SDK 4.18.1 稳定版本
